title: [QUESTION] SKCanvasView PanGestureRecognizer not called
body:
I added a PanGestureRecognizer to the ContentPage:
`
        <skia:SKCanvasView.GestureRecognizers>
            <PanGestureRecognizer PanUpdated="PanGestureRecognizer_PanUpdated"></PanGestureRecognizer>
        </skia:SKCanvasView.GestureRecognizers>`
the handler is not called.
In the Output window I see messages like:
[GestureDetector] obtain mCurrentDownEvent. id: 838281512 caller: mono.android.view.View_OnTouchListenerImplementor.n_onTouch:-2 mono.android.view.View_OnTouchListenerImplementor.onTouch:31 android.view.View.dispatchTouchEvent:15540 

Here is the project:
https://github.com/proficad/Viewer_Maui.git
